#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                uint64_t term,
                                uint64_t candidateId, 
                                uint64_t lastLogIndex,
                                uint64_t lastLogTerm,
                                uint64_t *termToUpdateForSendReqVote,
                                bool_t *vote_granted) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev1 = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      // Log_info("site_id is %s", std::to_string(site_id).c_str());
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      // Log_info("%s", std::to_string(p.second).c_str());
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [termToUpdateForSendReqVote, vote_granted, ev1](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *termToUpdateForSendReqVote;
        fu->get_reply() >> *vote_granted;
        ev1->Set(1);
        /* process the RPC response here */
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, term, candidateId, lastLogIndex, lastLogTerm, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev1;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                       siteid_t site_id,
                                       uint64_t leaderTerm,
                                       uint64_t leaderIdToUpdate,
                                       uint64_t prevLogIndex,
                                       uint64_t prevLogTerm,
                                       uint64_t leaderCommit,
                                       uint64_t *termToUpdateForAppendEntries,
                                       bool_t *followerAppendOK) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev2 = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [termToUpdateForAppendEntries, followerAppendOK, ev2,p](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *termToUpdateForAppendEntries;
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerAppendOK;
        ev2->Set(1);
        Log_info("callback done for EmptyappendEntries for %d returning %d and %d", p.first, *termToUpdateForAppendEntries, *followerAppendOK);
      };


      Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppendEntries, leaderTerm, leaderIdToUpdate, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, leaderCommit, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev2;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd,
                                  uint64_t cmdLogIndex,
                                  uint64_t cmdLogTerm,
                                  uint64_t leaderTerm,
                                  uint64_t leaderIdToUpdate,
                                  uint64_t prevLogIndex,
                                  uint64_t prevLogTerm,
                                  uint64_t leaderCommitIndex,
                                  uint64_t *termToUpdateForAppendEntries,
                                  bool_t *followerAppendOK) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev2 = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  // Log_info("before for event at address: %p", ev2);
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [termToUpdateForAppendEntries, followerAppendOK, ev2,p](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *termToUpdateForAppendEntries;
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerAppendOK;
        ev2->Set(1);
        Log_info("callback done for appendEntries for %d returning %d and %d", p.first, *termToUpdateForAppendEntries, *followerAppendOK);
      };
      Log_info("SendAppendEntries commo complete by server %d tp server %d", loc_id_, site_id);
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */


      MarshallDeputy md(cmd);
      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, md, cmdLogIndex, cmdLogTerm, leaderTerm, leaderIdToUpdate, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, leaderCommitIndex, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev2;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev3 = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev3](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev3->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  ev3->Wait(1000000);
  return ev3;
}


} // namespace janus
